settings.heading: What Makes Us Different
settings.text: At Table & Twine, we deliver quality meals to people who value convenience. Unlike other meal kit models, we keep prep time to a minimum. Since our chefs handle most of the mincing, muddling, and measuring, you’ll have a restaurant-quality dish in about 15 minutes – a fraction of the time needed to prepare a Blue Apron or HelloFresh meal.
settings.text2: Our chefs are also dedicated to developing “food that travels.” Hoping to ensure freshness, they prepare and package ingredients in such a way that your culinary experience is indistinguishable from that of a five-star restaurant.

settings.title: Artisanal Dishes
settings.text: A rotating menu of chef-driven dishes, exploring both classic flavors, as well as ethnic cuisines
settings.text-second: Our chefs use authentic techniques and locally-sourced ingredients

settings.title: Freshness Where It Counts
settings.text: Thanks to decades of catering experience, we have developed techniques to maximize freshness while minimizing final preparation time

settings.title: Minimal Hassle
settings.text: Our innovative design allows many of our items to be cooked in their original packaging, meaning fewer dirty dishes
settings.text-second: With our oven-ready butcher paper, you can place proteins and many sides on a sheet pan in the oven using  the packaging to reduce clean-up.

settings.title: Flexible Portions
settings.text: Our dinner portions are available in single-serving increments, so we never force customers to order more than they need
settings.text-second: Whether it’s a quick dinner for one or a feast for five, Table & Twine can deliver tasty, nourishing meals

settings.title: Faster Prep
settings.text: We season, marinate, and par-cook vegetables; you just finish them in the oven in under 15 minutes to ensure the right consistency and temperature

settings.title: Excellent Value
settings.text: Each week we offer everyday select dinner options for $17.99
settings.text-second: Our premium meals feature fine cuts of beef or seafood and start at $19.99.

settings.section_text:
At Table & Twine, we believe dinner should be an experience – not a chore. That’s why our chefs do most of the work for you. They spend hours shopping and chopping so, come mealtime, you can simply untwine and dine.

Unlike other meal kit services, our chefs also recommend tantalizing pairings like house-made cocktails, appetizers, and desserts. These delectable add-ons are the perfect complement to our main entrées, which rotate bi-weekly, as well as seasonal offerings, kids’ meals, and other à la carte items.
